title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Podcast-Based Self-Directed Learning for Acquiring Medical Education Information

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners will acquire medical terminology with 80% or higher accuracy through podcast content.
Learners will enhance self-directed information analysis skills by maintaining weekly learning logs based on podcast content.
Learners will propose three or more practical strategies applicable to real-world settings through an integrated medical knowledge project at the end of a four-week course.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
